thread.section_title: Apparthotel Mercure Paris Boulogne - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Boulogne-Billancourt, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Triste - Review
thread.title_full: Triste - Review of Apparthotel Mercure Paris Boulogne, Boulogne-Billancourt, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lionel D
title: Triste - Review
text:
Check in: This is the "hotel", you reserved at the "apart-hotel". OK where do we go? Ha, It is the same desk... Very sad lights in the room, decor 1960 orange, not in bad shape simply very sad as well. Clean but in one of our two rooms, the carpet had so many stains we had to check very closely to realize that it was not made on purpose.
The hotel is nicer -Mercure style-, if you do not absolutely need a kitchen (well equipped) avoid the apart-hotel.
